scripts.build: vite build && touch docs/.nojekyll && git add docs/ -f
scripts.binaryen: shx mv node_modules/googletest node_modules/binaryen/third_party && cd node_modules/binaryen && emcmake cmake -DBUILD_FOR_BROWSER=ON . && emmake make
scripts.lint:js: npx eslint . --ext .js,.mjs --fix --ignore-pattern docs/ --ignore-pattern third-party/ --ignore-pattern dev-dist/ && npx find-unused-exports
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.deploy: npm run fix && npm run lint && npm run build && git add . && git commit -a && git push
scripts.prepare: npm run binaryen && npm run build
